# sceneDidLoad()

**Instance Method**

Tells you when the scene is presented.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func sceneDidLoad()
```

```swift
func sceneDidLoad()
```

## Discussion

This method is intended to be overridden in a subclass. It is the preferred location to peform custom setup after the scene has been initialized or decoded.

## Responding to Loading and Resizing Events

- **didChangeSize(_:)**: Tells you when the scene’s size has changed.
- **willMove(from:)**: Tells you when the scene is about to be removed from a view.
- **didMove(to:)**: Tells you when the scene is presented by a view.
